title: We were pleased. Good experience.
text:
We expected the room to be teeny-tiny, but it was fine and spotlessly clean. Our room had 2 full beds and a bunk bed (for my 18 and 19 yr old sons). Not much privacy, but definitely not too small. There was a desk, dresser drawer, large screen TV (which could only be viewed from the bunks and 1 of the full beds). We didn't need to ask the front desk for anything, so can't complain about service. Everyone was friendly from check-in to check-out. My sons said the bunk beds were not very comfortable (they were probably built for smaller folks), but our full beds were fine. The whole experience was a pleasant one. I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 only because it's not an up-scale, posh hotel, but is quite nice and comfortable. I don't understand how anyone could give a negative review unless they were comparing to a super up-scale hotel. The location is GREAT! 48th near 7th and Broadway. We were on the 13th of 16 floors. Noise at night was minimal. Only a siren or 2 here and there - which were disruptive - but, afterall it IS Time Square! We were on the 13th of 16 floors. Otherwise, not a sound. Large bathroom with an open shower, which is kind of odd and gets the floors wet.
